jcr:content.jcr:title: List of lighthouses and lightvessels in Denmark

contentheadline.headline: List of lighthouses and lightvessels in Denmark

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[lighthouse]]s and [[lightvessel]]s in [[Denmark]]'''. ==[[Bornholm]]== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Name !| Location !| Year !| Coordinates !| Image !| Refs |- | [[Christiansø Lighthouse]] || [[Christiansø]] || 1798 || {{coord|55|19|27|N|15|11|29|E}} || [[File:Christiansoe.jpg|150px]] || |- | [[Dueodde Lighthouse]] || [[Dueodde]] || 1962 || {{coord|54|59|30|N|15|04|28|E}} || [[File:DueodddeFyr.jpg|150px]] || <ref name=Bornholm>{{cite web|title=Lighthouses of Denmark: Bornholm|url=http://www.unc.edu/~rowlett/lighthouse/dnkb.htm|accessdate=2012-11-08}}</ref> |- | [[Hammeren Lighthouse]] || [[Hammeren]] || 1802 || {{coord|55|17|11|N|14|45|55|E}} || [[File:Bornholm - Hammeren Fyr.jpg|150px]] || <ref name=Bornholm/> |- | [[Hammer Odde Lighthouse]] || [[Hammeren]] || 1885 || {{coord|55|17|52|N|14|46|19|E}} || [[File:Bornholm - Hammeren - Hammerodde Fyr.jpg|150px]] || <ref name=Bornholm/> |- | [[Rønne Lighthouse]] || [[Rønne]] || 1880 || {{coord|55|05|58|N|14|41|46|E}} || [[File:Rønne, Bornholm (2012-07-03), by Klugschnacker in Wikipedia (4).JPG|150px]] || <ref name=Bornholm/> |- | [[Svaneke Lighthouse]] || [[Svaneke]] || 1919 || {{coord|55|07|54|N|15|09|10|E}} || [[File:Svaneke Fyr.jpg|150px]] || <ref name=Bornholm/> |- |} ==Other== * Fyrskib XXI * Fyrskib XVII * [[Hirtshals]] Fyr * Motorfyrskib I * Skagens Rev * [[Rubjerg Knude lighthouse]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.leuchtturm-welt.net/HTML/DKFOTO/DK.HTM Leuchtturm net's collection of photographs of Danish lighthouses and lightvessels] {{Expand list|date=August 2008}} {{Europe topic|List of lighthouses in}} [[Category:Danish architecture]] [[Category:Lists of lighthouses|Denmark]] [[Category:Lists of buildings and structures in Denmark|Lighthouses]] [[Category:Denmark transport-related lists]]
